//
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   float4 DNEResolution;
//   float4 DNESpecularAttenuation;
//   float4 DiffuseOverrideParameter;
//   float4 LightColorAndFalloffExponent;
//   float4x4 ScreenToShadowMatrix;
//   float4 ShadowBufferAndTexelSize;
//   sampler2D ShadowDepthTexture;
//   float ShadowOverrideFactor;
//   sampler2D ShadowWarpFunctionTexture;
//   float4 SpecularOverrideParameter;
//   float2 SpotAngles;
//   float3 SpotDirection;
//   bool bReceiveDynamicShadows;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                         Reg   Size
//   ---------------------------- ----- ----
//   bReceiveDynamicShadows       b0       1
//   DNESpecularAttenuation       c0       1
//   DiffuseOverrideParameter     c4       1
//   SpecularOverrideParameter    c5       1
//   ScreenToShadowMatrix         c7       4
//   DNEResolution                c11      1
//   LightColorAndFalloffExponent c12      1
//   ShadowBufferAndTexelSize     c13      1
//   ShadowOverrideFactor         c14      1
//   SpotDirection                c15      1
//   SpotAngles                   c16      1
//   ShadowWarpFunctionTexture    s0       1
//   ShadowDepthTexture           s1       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c1, 0, 2, 1, 0.5
    def c2, -9.99999997e-007, 200, 0, 0
    dcl_texcoord4_pp v0.xyz
    dcl_texcoord5 v1.xyz
    dcl_texcoord6 v2
    dcl_texcoord7 v3.w
    dcl vPos.xy
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s15

    nrm_pp r0.xyz, v2
    nrm_pp r1.xyz, v0
    mad_pp r0.xyz, r0.z, c1.xxyw, -r0
    dp3 r0.w, v1, v1
    rsq r1.w, r0.w
    mul r2.xyz, r1.w, v1
    dp3 r1.w, r2, -c15
    add r1.w, r1.w, -c16.x
    mul_sat r1.w, r1.w, c16.y
    mul_pp r2.x, r1.w, r1.w
    texld_pp r3, c1.zwzw, s0
    mov r2.yw, c1.w
    texld_pp r4, r2, s0
    add r1.w, -r0.w, c1.z
    mul r1.w, r3.x, r1.w
    mul r5, r4.x, r1.w
    mov r6, r5
    texkill r6
    if b0
      mad r2.xy, vPos, c11, c11.zwzw
      mul r2.xy, r2, v3.w
      mul r6, r2.y, c8

// Unreal Engine shadow fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --only-autofixed --git --quiet CRC32_2FAD50B9_0.txt
add r11.w, v2.w, -r11.y
mad r2.x, -r11.w, r11.x, r2.x

      mad r6, c7, r2.x, r6
      mad r6, c9, v2.w, r6
      mad r6, c10, v3.w, r6
      rcp r1.w, r6.w
      mul r2.xy, r1.w, r6
      texld r7, r2, s1
      mov r5.xz, c1
      mad r8, c13.wwzw, r5.xzzx, r2.xyxy
      texld r9, r8, s1
      texld r8, r8.zwzw, s1
      mad r3.yz, r6.xxyw, r1.w, c13.xzww
      texld r10, r3.yzzw, s1
      mov r7.y, r9.x
      mov r7.z, r8.x
      mov r7.w, r10.x
      add r6, r6.z, -r7
      cmp r7, r6, c1.x, c1.z
      mul r2.xy, r2, c13
      frc r2.xy, r2
      cmp r3.yz, r6.xxyw, -c1.x, -c1.z
      add r3.yz, r3, r7.xzww
      mad r3.yz, r2.x, r3, r7.xxyw
      lrp r1.w, r2.y, r3.z, r3.y
      mul r1.w, r1.w, c14.x
      mul_pp r3.yzw, r1.w, r3.x
    else
      mov_pp r3.yzw, r3.x
    endif
    add_pp r4.yzw, c5.xxyz, c5.w
    mov_sat r0.w, r0.w
    add r0.w, -r0.w, c1.z
    pow_sat_pp r2.z, r0.w, c12.w
    texld_pp r2, r2.zwzw, s0
    mov_sat_pp r0.w, r1.z
    add r1.w, r0.w, c2.x
    mul r0.w, r0.w, c0.w
    dp3_sat_pp r0.x, r0, r1
    add r0.y, r0.x, c2.x
    pow_pp r1.x, r0.x, c2.y
    mul r0.x, r1.x, c0.x
    mul r1.xyz, r0.w, c4
    cmp r1.xyz, r1.w, r1, c1.x
    mul_pp r0.xzw, r4.yyzw, r0.x
    cmp_pp r0.xyz, r0.y, r0.xzww, c1.x
    add_pp r0.xyz, r0, r1
    mul_pp r0.xyz, r3.yzww, r0
    mul r0.xyz, r0, c12
    mul r0.xyz, r2.x, r0
    mul r0.xyz, r4.x, r0
    cmp oC0.xyz, -r5.w, c1.x, r0
    mov oC0.w, c1.x

// approximately 83 instruction slots used (7 texture, 76 arithmetic)
